item.title: Tmux screen tips
item.description: Tmux cheatsheet tmux shortcuts & cheatsheet start new: tmux start new with session name: tmux new -s myname attach: tmux a # (or at, or attach) attach to named: tmux a -t myname list sessions: tmux ls kill session: tmux kill-session -t myname Kill all the tmux sessions: tmux ls | grep : | cut -d. -f1 | awk '{print substr($1, 0, length($1)-1)}' | xargs kill In tmux, hit the prefix ctrl+b (my modified prefix is ctrl+a) and then:
